name: Not Tonight
description: Person of European Heritage #112: Welcome to Relocation Block B, your new home. Your designated role is 'Bouncer'. Work hard, stay out of trouble, and we might let you stay in the UK.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or later Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 550/equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: High-range Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760/equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
